meanings.definition: insects with a single pair of wings
meanings.sent1: The dipterans buzzed around the garden, their single pair of wings glistening in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: I learned in school that dipterans are insects with only one set of wings.
meanings.sent3: The dipterans held a tiny fashion show, flaunting their unique single pair of wings.
meanings.sent4: The dipterans moved gracefully through the air, their lone pair of wings propelling them forward.
meanings.sent5: As I watched the dipterans flutter by, I marveled at their elegant single pair of wings.

meanings.definition: relating to or denoting the order Diptera, which includes flies
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the dipterans species, focusing on their unique characteristics within the order Diptera.
meanings.sent2: The dipterans population in the forest was thriving, attracting researchers from around the world.
meanings.sent3: At the insect party, the dipterans were the life of the party, sharing fascinating facts about their Diptera order.
meanings.sent4: The dipterans in the field danced in harmony, a true reflection of the unity within the Diptera order.
meanings.sent5: In the world of insects, the dipterans stood out for their connection to the diverse Diptera order.
